alert.note: Alert for Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 4:09PM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. Soucook River Near Pembroke affecting Merrimack County. For the SOUHEGAN RIVER...including Milford, Merrimack...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Soucook River...including Pembroke...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Soucook River near Pembroke. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, A home downstream of Pembroke Road bridge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.6 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
